ChangeList.Description: Added the [crossCloudAzureActiveDirectoryTarget](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/crosscloudazureactivedirectorytarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use this in Azure AD Entitlement Management connected organizations to refer to an Azure Active Directory tenant in another cloud.

Added the [additionalAccess](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/accesspackageassignment-additionalaccess?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [accessPackageAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accesspackageassignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for application permission `EntitlementManagement.Read.All` to the read operations of the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroleassignment?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for application permission `EntitlementManagement.ReadWrite.All` to the read and write operations of the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroleassignment?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for application permission `EntitlementManagement.Read.All` to the read operations of the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroledefinition?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for application permission `EntitlementManagement.ReadWrite.All` to the read operations of the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroledefinition?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **assignmentPolicies** relationship to the [accessPackage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessPackage?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **assignmentPolicy** relationship to the [accessPackageAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessPackageAssignment?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **assignmentPolicies** relationship to the [entitlementManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/entitlementManagement?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [accessPackageAssignmentPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/accesspackageassignmentpolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and related methods for controlling how users receive assignments to access packages in entitlement management.
Added the **accessReviewExpirationBehavior** enumeration type.
Added the **allowedTargetScope** enumeration type.
Added the [accessPackageApprovalStage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessPackageApprovalStage?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the [accessPackageAssignmentApprovalSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessPackageAssignmentApprovalSettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the [accessPackageAssignmentRequestorSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessPackageAssignmentRequestorSettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the [accessPackageAssignmentReviewSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessPackageAssignmentReviewSettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the [targetApplicationOwners](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/targetApplicationOwners?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the [targetManager](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/targetManager?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.

Added the [approval](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approval?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and related methods. Use this method in Azure AD Entitlement Management to retrieve approval objects.

Added the [approvalStage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approvalstage?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and related methods. Use this method in Azure AD Entitlement Management to manage approval stages for an approval object.
Added the **approvalFilterByCurrentUserOptions** enumeration type.
Added the **accessPackageAssignmentApprovals** relationship to the [entitlementManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/entitlementmanagement?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
